attributes.action: Review the advanced declassifying of 2400 acres of greenfield land to be sold on
attributes.additional_details: To protect greenfield sites from large scale estates and urbanisation under false pretenses. Only 12.4% of england in greenbelt but this govt is selling it off by the acre to the highest bidder
attributes.background: Review why this land is being sold to big companies when these homes will not be "affordable " just more houses for the mid to high earning people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want increase protections for greenbelt land, or you want the Government not to undertake specific projects. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
